Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.2 Cittaduka » 10.2.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.2.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.2.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Mahantaraduka
Cittaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
70.
2483Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  nocittā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2484Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  nocittā hetū cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
2485Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  nocittā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (3)
